original_text: All these curses will happen to you. They will be like an enemy that chases after you, catches you, and destroys you. That will happen to you, if you refuse to obey the Lord your God. If you do not obey his commands and his rules that he has given to you, these troubles will happen to you.
korean_text: 네가 네 하나님 여호와의 말씀을 청종하지 아니하고 네게 명령하신 그의 명령과 규례를 지키지 아니하므로 이 모든 저주가 네게 와서 너를 따르고 네게 이르러 마침내 너를 멸하리니

sentences.original_text: All these curses will happen to you
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 저주들이 너에게 닥칠 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will be like an enemy that chases after you
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 너를 쫓아오는 원수와 같을 것이다

sentences.original_text: if you refuse to obey the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 하나님 여호와를 순종하기를 거절하면

sentences.original_text: If you do not obey his commands and his rules
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그의 명령과 규례들을 순종하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: that he has given to you
these troubles will happen to you
